problems.title: Two Sum
problems.description: Given an array of integers `nums` and an integer `target`, return the indices of the two numbers that add up to target.

problems.title: Reverse Integer
problems.description: Given a signed 32-bit integer x, return x with its digits reversed. If reversing causes overflow, return 0.

problems.title: Palindrome Number
problems.description: Given an integer x, return true if x is a palindrome, and false otherwise.
